item.title: Rekindling old flames
item.description: Some time ago, some long, long time ago, I started working on a ray tracer. Yes, you’re right, the world doesn’t need another ray tracer. I wasn’t writing another ray tracer though. I was writing the ray tracer from this book. Well, not line for line, but I was using it for the most part and just adjusting a few things to my liking and style. Initially I started it because I was curious how these things really work under the hood.
